ingredients.item: 1 essential Waitrose Carrot, halved and sliced
70g pack essential Waitrose British Wafer Thin Roast Chicken, shredded

instructions.step: Place the miso paste in a saucepan and pour over 600ml boiling water. Bring to the boil, add the carrot and noodles then cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in the onions and chicken, cook for 2â€“3 minutes and serve.
